Using Variables

Variables in Docs Assembler allow you to define reusable pieces of text or markdown in one place and reference them throughout your documentation.

Defining a Variable

Variables are defined in special variable files, which use the .tsvar file extension. When the Docs Assembler extension is installed, Visual Studio Code will recognize these files and provide syntax highlighting and IntelliSense as if they were standard Markdown.
